sense.gloss: strong person, person putting on a brave front
bamboo tube with holes drilled in it (used as a stand for kitchen utensils, fans, etc.)

sdata.j: うちの↑前↑↓まえ↓のやせ↑犬↑↓いぬ↓・↑陰弁慶↑↓かげ|べんけい|↓。
sdata.e: Every dog is a lion at home.

sdata.j: ↑内弁慶↑↓うち|べんけい|↓は↑誰↑↓だれ↓でもできる。
sdata.e: Every cock crows on his own dunghill.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑内弁慶↑↓うち|べんけい|↓だ。
sdata.e: He is a lion at home and a mouse outside.
